Trade/Device Name(s): WaveSense Jazz Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): WaveSense Jazz Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for WaveSense Jazz Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from finger stick, palm, and forearm
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger stick, palm, and/or forearm for at-home (OTC) use by persons with diabetes to monitor diabetes control effectiveness
